title: Master Data Engineering with UNIQ Technologies
subtitle: Become an industry-ready Data Engineer with UNIQ Technologies. This course covers Python, SQL, Big Data, Hadoop, Spark, Data Warehousing, ETL Pipelines, Cloud Data Engineering, and Real-Time Streaming Systems. Ideal for freshers, software developers, and professionals looking to transition into Data Engineering roles.

faq.question: What is a Data Engineering course?
faq.answer: The Data Engineering course teaches you to build large-scale data pipelines using Python, SQL, Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, and cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, and GCP.

faq.question: Do I need coding experience?
faq.answer: Basic programming knowledge helps, but the course starts from scratch, covering Python and SQL fundamentals.

faq.question: What tools will I learn?
faq.answer: Python, SQL, Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, Airflow, Databricks, AWS S3, Redshift, Glue, Lambda, Azure Data Factory, BigQuery, and ETL tools.

faq.question: Is Data Engineering good for freshers?
faq.answer: Absolutely! Many companies hire freshers for junior Data Engineer and ETL Developer roles.

faq.question: Do you provide placement support?
faq.answer: Yes! We provide 100% placement support with resume building, mock interviews, and daily job updates.

faq.question: Is there a certificate after completion?
faq.answer: Yes, you receive both Course Completion and Internship Certificates recognized by IT companies.

faq.question: Do you provide real-time projects?
faq.answer: Yes! You will work on Hadoop, Spark data processing, Kafka streaming, data warehousing, and cloud pipelines.

faq.question: Can non-IT students join?
faq.answer: Yes! Even non-IT graduates can become Data Engineers with the right training.

faq.question: Do you offer online and offline classes?
faq.answer: Yes, both modes are available and switching between them is free.

faq.question: What is the course duration?
faq.answer: The duration is 4â€“6 months depending on weekday/weekend batches.
